column4: my Ubuntu doesn't have sound anymore after I got my wireless working? did I block out something that might've affected the sound performance?
does anyone know why my sound went away?
why don't I have sound?
i have no sound? what happened?
did sound suddenly stop working? or never worked?
did you go to System->Preferences->Sound?
okay, click test on the 1st one okay?
that is fine. Try that drop down menu there, and switch the selection to another sound driver
then click test again
untill you get to a driver that works, it wont take long
yes, it will produce a medium pitch tone
out of none of them?
none of them works
that is not good.
ok. i was trying to get the wireless connection working. and i did! but now the sound is gone
oh, so you had switchy switchy happen eh
is there any chance i might've blacklisted something i shouldn't have?
Possibly, I do not know how to help you with that issue--funny enough I am having a sound issue myself.
lol
thx though
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/SoundTroubleshooting
